title: eppOdu pirakkum
sahitya:
eppOdu pirakkum ippEdai pAl irakkam appanE taNi kaittala subrahmaNyanE


anupallavi

  oppilAk-karuNaiyin uraiviDamAm kaDalE ibbhuviyil aDiyArin IdillAp-pughaliDamE


caraNam    arupaDai vIDamarum Atral mighum vIranE Arumukha mOhana pErezil gambhIranE
sUranai uru mATri Eru mayilAi EtravanE tArakamAghum unadu tALinaip-pOTruvanE
